org.epics.graphene

Interface ValueScale


  • public interface ValueScale
    The scale to be used to create axis references and rescale values.
    Author:
    carcassi

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double invScaleValue(double scaleValue, double minValue, double maxValue, double newMinValue, double newMaxValue)
      Scales the scale value to the actual value.
      ValueAxis references(org.epics.util.stats.Range range, int minRefs, int maxRegs)
      Returns the reference axes for a given range
      double scaleValue(double value, double minValue, double maxValue, double newMinValue, double newMaxValue)
      Scales the actual value to the scale value.

    • Method Detail

      • scaleValue

        double scaleValue(double value,
                double minValue,
                double maxValue,
                double newMinValue,
                double newMaxValue)
        Scales the actual value to the scale value.
        Parameters:
        value - actual value to be scaled
        minValue - actual range min
        maxValue - actual range max
        newMinValue - scale range min
        newMaxValue - scale range max
        Returns:
        new value in the scale

      • invScaleValue

        double invScaleValue(double scaleValue,
                   double minValue,
                   double maxValue,
                   double newMinValue,
                   double newMaxValue)
        Scales the scale value to the actual value.
        Parameters:
        scaleValue - scale value to be scaled
        minValue - actual range min
        maxValue - actual range max
        newMinValue - scale range min
        newMaxValue - scale range max
        Returns:
        new value in the actual range

      • references

        ValueAxis references(org.epics.util.stats.Range range,
                   int minRefs,
                   int maxRegs)
        Returns the reference axes for a given range
        Parameters:
        range - the range of values to create a reference axis for
        minRefs - minimum references
        maxRegs - max references
        Returns:
        reference axes
